contest-event.event-date:
July 15, 1899 D Pontypridd Contest (Class B)
Pontypridd Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-b
None
Oberon [unknown arranger]
Taff Vale Park, Pontypridd 1st prize £12. 2nd prize £7. 3rd prize £4 and 4th prize £2 divided between Mountain Ash and Cwmtawe. 10 bands entered, 8 bands competed. Best cornet & euph: Burry Port. 9th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest.
April 14, 2012, 1:59 p.m. Aug. 27, 2018, 7:02 p.m.
1 Burry Port Town Rufus Fletcher
2 Cory Band Phineas Ambler
3 Mountain Ash Volunteers William Shaw
3 Morgan's Cwmtawe Ystalyfera Evan John Evans
Unknown Result Tonyrefail Silver Prize Band Samuel Schofield
Unknown Result Pentre Volunteers Robert Dawson
Unknown Result Gwaun-cae-Gurwen George Hannay
Unknown Result Trebanos Public Thomas Hanney
